generic_imitate.body: Trigger your sensor manually or toggle the learn switch to DEL and then back to SET.

generic_test_remote.body: Trigger your sensor manually or use the LEARN switch on your sensor to test the signal. Press next to continue.

generic_imitate.body:
Press the button that is paired to your socket.

(Note. Homey only supports transmitters of which the product code starts with an A. If you use an old remote for this device please let Homey generate a new signal for the device)

generic_program.body:
Press and hold the program button on your socket for a few seconds, the light on your socket should start blinking when you release the button. When it is in pairing mode click next.

(Note. If you experience difficulties pairing try to reset your device by holding the program button for 10 seconds when it is blinking and then pressing the program button once.)

generic_imitate.body:
Press the up/down button that is paired to your blinds.

(Note. For this device Homey only supports transmitters of which the product code starts with an A. If you use an old remote for this device please let Homey generate a new signal for the device)

generic_test_switch.title: Test your blinds
generic_test_switch.body: Use the buttons above to test your blinds. Press next to continue.

generic_test_switch_2.body: Use your remote or the buttons above to test your blinds. Press next to continue.

generic_choice.body: Choose if you want to copy the signal from your doorbell or if you want to generate a new signal to pair your doorbell with.

generic_test_button.title: Test your doorbell
generic_test_button.body: Use the button above to test your doorbell. Press next to continue.

generic_test_button_2.body: Use your doorbell or the button above to test your doorbell. Press next to continue.

generic_program.body:
Unplug the socket for a couple of seconds and plug it back in, the light should now be blinking. When it is in pairing mode click next.

(Note. If you experience diffuculties pairing try to reset your device by putting it in pairing mode and holding the group button on the remote for 5 seconds. All addresses should now be cleared from the socket.)

generic_imitate.body: Press the button that is paired to your device.

generic_program.title: Put the device in pairing mode
generic_program.body:
Press and hold the program button on your device for a few seconds to put it in pairing mode, then click next.

(Note. If you experience difficulties pairing try to reset your device by holding the program button for 10 seconds when it is blinking and then pressing the program button once.)

generic_test_switch.title: Test your device
generic_test_switch.body: Use the switch above to test your device. Press next to continue.

generic_test_switch_2.body: Use your remote or the switch above to test your device. Press next to continue.

generic_imitate.body: Press the up/down button that is paired to your blinds.

generic_choice.title: Copy signal from remote or pair device with Homey�
generic_choice.body: Choose if you want to copy an existing signal from a paired remote or if you want to generate a new signal to pair this device.�
Choose if you want to copy an existing signal from a paired remote or if you want manually set the codewheels to pair this device.�

generic_imitate.title: Copy your remote signal�
generic_imitate.body: Press the button that is paired to your socket.�

generic_test_switch.title: Test your socket�
generic_test_switch.body: Use the switch above to test your socket. Press next to continue.�

generic_test_switch_2.body: Use your remote or the switch above to test your socket. Press next to continue.�

generic_program.title: Put the socket in pairing mode�

generic_imitate.title: Identify your wall switch�
generic_imitate.body: Press a random button on your wall switch to pair it.�

generic_test_remote.title: Test your wall switch�
generic_test_remote.body: Press a random button on your wall switch or click the buttons in the image above to test the signal. Press next to continue.�

generic_imitate.title: Identify your remote�
generic_imitate.body: Click a button on your remote to pair it.�
Press the button that is paired to your fitting.

generic_program.body:
Press and hold the program button on your fitting for a few seconds, the light on your fitting should start blinking when you release the button. When it is in pairing mode click next.

(Note. If you experience difficulties pairing try to reset your device by holding the program button for 10 seconds when it is blinking and then pressing the program button once.)

generic_test_switch.title: Test your fitting
generic_test_switch.body: Use the switch above to test your fitting. Press next to continue.

generic_test_switch_2.body: Use your remote or the switch above to test your fitting. Press next to continue.

generic_imitate.title: Pair your constact sensor
generic_imitate.body: Connect and then disconnect the two parts of your sensor.

generic_test_remote.title: Test your contact sensor
generic_test_remote.body: Use your contact sensor to test the signal. Press next to continue.

generic_imitate.body: Press the button that is paired to your lamp.

generic_program.body: Turn the power to the light on and off 3 times, or turn the light on and off with your remote 5 times, within 15 seconds to put the lamp in pairing mode. The lamp should now be blinking. Then click next.

generic_test_switch.title: Test your lamp
generic_test_switch.body: Use the switch above to test your lamp. Press next to continue.

generic_test_switch_2.body: Use your remote or the switch above to test your lamp. Press next to continue.

error.device_exists: This device is already paired with Homey.�
error.no_device: No device set to pair. Please close the pairing wizard and try again.�
error.no_settings: No settings object. Please try again.�
error.invalid_device: The device that was created is invalid. Please try again.�

generic_codewheel.title: Configure your device code�
generic_codewheel.body: Click the characters on the code wheel above or configure the wheels on the device so they match, then click next.�

generic_program.title: Pair your device with Homey�
generic_program.body: Put your device in pairing mode, then click next to pair your device with Homey.�

generic_test_remote.title: Test your remote�
generic_test_remote.body: Press a random button on your remote or click the button in the image above to test the signal. Press next to continue.�

deprecated: This driver is deprecated. Please remove this device and pair it again in the pair wizard.
